Articles.Content: Can someone please make a Asteroid Belt mod that adds planets like ceres and vesta to the stock game :3
Dres is an analogue of Ceres, as for Vesta, try installing RSS and RSS Planets and Moons Extended, I think that has some asteroid belt objects.

Dres is an analogue of Ceres, as for Vesta, try installing RSS and RSS Planets and Moons Extended, I think that has some asteroid belt objects.

I know. I've played with Rss for countless hours. (waiting for Pete to finish Rve) I want a stock add on that makes the space between Duna and Jool more " fun"
Custom asteroids? Dres is fun, go and explore it and it's dres-teroids!
